social_issues: Allegations of forced overtime and poor working conditions in Chinese factories
Pressure from Greenpeace and other environmental groups
governance_issues: Execution risks in transitioning to an IP-driven, high-performing toy company
Reputational risks tied to product quality control and labor practices
